description:
### 14.1 avgblur_vulkan

Apply an average blur filter, implemented on the GPU using Vulkan.

The filter accepts the following options:

**sizeX**

    Set horizontal radius size. Range is [1, 32] and default value is 3. 

**sizeY**

    Set vertical radius size. Range is [1, 32] and default value is 3. 

**planes**

    Set which planes to filter. Default value is 0xf, by which all planes are processed.
name: avgblur_vulkan

options.description: Set horizontal radius size. Range is [1, 32] and default value is 3.
options.name: sizeX

options.description: Set vertical radius size. Range is [1, 32] and default value is 3.
options.name: sizeY

options.description: Set which planes to filter. Default value is 0xf, by which all planes are processed.
options.name: planes
